name: events
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool economic_events_calendar.
Tool description: Get complete list of all economic events. Filter by countries & dates
API description: Get all economic events 
Filter by countries symbols like: US, JP, GB and so on. You can add multiple separating by comma or remove to get all events.
Filter by date: from & to using date in format 2023-05-09

to.description: End date for filtering events, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Defaults to None.

is_from.description: Start date for filtering events, in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Defaults to None.

countries.description: Comma-separated list of country codes to filter the events. Defaults to 'US,GB'.
